content.question: Which of the following is true of both monopolistically competitive and perfectly competitive firms in long-run equilibrium?

choices.label: Marginal revenue equals average total cost.
Marginal cost equals average total cost.
Price is greater than marginal cost.
Production occurs at minimum average total cost.
